LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.label: shell shock
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.description: Shell shock is a mental disorder characterized by symptoms such as fatigue, tremor, confusion, nightmares and impaired sight and hearing. Often diagnosed when a soldier is unable to function and no obvious cause can be identified.
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.initial-0.label: initial
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.initial-1.label: initial
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.serious.label: serious
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.catatonic.label: catatonic
LanguageData.FT_ShellShock.stages.extreme.label: extreme
